casebody.data:
Russell BUCKLEW, petitioner,
v.
Anne L. PRECYTHE, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al. No. 17-8151. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 19, 2018.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted, and Cheryl A. Pilate, Esquire, of Kansas City, Missouri, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
